snippet: Washington State is the latest college to enter the meat market, offering premium beef, alongside its longtime staple, Cougar Gold, cheese in a can.
abstract: Washington State University is latest college to enter meat market, offering premium beef, alongside its longtime staple, Cougar Gold, cheese in a can; movement for locally sourced food has fueled growth in student-led agriculture with new or expanded farm-to-table product lines.
lead_paragraph: Washington State is the latest college to enter the meat market, offering premium beef, alongside its longtime staple, Cougar Gold, cheese in a can.

headline.seo: How About a University Steak With Your Sweatshirt?
headline.main: A University Steak to Go With That Sweatshirt?
headline.print_headline: A University Steak to Go With That Sweatshirt?
